website_summaries.verdict: Ecco introduced a modernized tennis-inspired shoe dubbed as the Ecco Jack Sneaker. It has a masculine look that displays flexible leather upper that rests atop a thick rubber sole. The brand used advanced elements to ensure exceptional, comfortable strides while keeping the feet fresh and dry.Though this model leans towards the expensive price range, it is sure worth every penny for its excellent flexibility, durability, comfort, and dapper style. The Ecco Jack Sneaker will surely take away the strain of living in the urban, even without his Rose.
pros: The Ecco Jack Sneaker fits true to size
The majority of the reviewers praised the comfort level of this sneaker
Most users appreciated the easy to style design of this kick
Few reviewers cited that this pair cushions the impact, effectively
The perforations on the vamp and sides deliver excellent breathability, said few wearers
Many enjoyed the roomy toe box and ample arch support of this sneaker
Some reviewers testified that this sneaker is suitable for all-day wearing without feeling any pain
Most users praised the durability of the Ecco Jack Sneaker
Many liked to use this for walking, working, and even going out at night
Most users recommended this product to their peers
One user cited about the removable insole which she can change with her preferred orthotics
cons: The Ecco Jack Sneaker is found at an expensive price point
A couple of reviewers complained that this sneaker needs a break-in time

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Without questions the best shoe I might have ever purchased! I needed a good flexible walking shoe for a trip but I've in the past had the similar problem of buying a new shoe and with out time to break in would cause more pain then comfort. ECCO Jack Slip Sneaker proved me wrong. I bought the show a week before my trip and pretty much spend the the week on my trip walking an average 5 miles a day. Shoe was soft, flexible, comfortable, and amazing. It was if the shoe was already broken in for me without the pre-break-in. As with all my previous ECCO shoes I am new life time customer!
customer_reviews.author: Art Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort, but order smaller size than usual
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable, casual pair of sneaker slip-ons, but order a half to whole size smaller than what you normally wear, as they run large.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Gerber Perlman

customer_reviews.title: This shoe was comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was comfortable right out of the box. I ordered a 43. It was perfect for my 9.5-10 narrow foot ..
customer_reviews.author: shekmark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are absolutely perfect. Love the fit, the look and the comfort / support. Five stars all around!
customer_reviews.author: greggmck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this style and have several different pairs of various colors and fabrics.
customer_reviews.author: jcflyer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes. Comfortable for my husband's troubled feet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes. Comfortable for my husband's troubled feet. He loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love Ecco, they run a little big
customer_reviews.text: Love Ecco, they run a little big, but are great and comfortable. Ecco makes the best shoes! Even their bad is better than most everyone else
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Waltke

customer_reviews.title: Ecco shoes are great. I have casual
customer_reviews.text: Ecco shoes are great . I have casual , golf and work boots they all are very comfortable. They are basically the only shoes I buy
customer_reviews.author: martin t moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in my family loved the look. Comfortable and very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: twain

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a shoe that was on display for a very long time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much like the shoe, but I think they look too wide. Wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Shewey

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome. I like ECCO's so much they are pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: Own a black pair of these that I wear regularly. Had them 2 years. They are awesome. I like ECCO's so much they are pretty much the only shoe I buy now.
customer_reviews.author: capitalist pig
